Murray-Darling Basin Polygon

basin.Rd

Polygon defining the Murray-Darling Basin boundary. Sourced from MDBA data website, with direct link given below.

Usage

basin

Format

basin An sf object with one polygon:

DDIV_NAME

Polygon name

AREA_HA, SHAPE_AREA, SHAPE_LEN

basic descriptions

Source

https://data.gov.au/data/dataset/4ede9aed-5620-47db-a72b-0b3aa0a3ced0/resource/8a6d889d-723b-492d-8c12-b8b0d1ba4b5a/download/sworkingadhocjobsj4430dataoutputsmdb_boundarymdb_boundary.zip
